rang bzhin spangs nas ni/ /bdag la 'dod pa'i bde chen sbyor/ /khyed mi bzhugs na bdag 'gum pas/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spangs la/ /ri khrod ma 'bras grub par ni/ /kye yi rdo rje khyed bzhengs shig /'jig rten phyir smon 'dod pa'i gtso/ /ci phyir stong pa'i ngang las

bzhugs/ /khyod mi bzhugs na phyogs mi khums/ /gtum mo bdag ni gsol ba 'debs/ /g.yung mo bdag ni yid rmongs pas/ /snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad par/ /bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis/ /khyod ni mig 'phrul lta bur bzhengs/ /bskul ba'i glu'o/ /bskul

bas sngon gyi byang chub kyi/ /smon lam rjes su dran pa'o/ /khu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs pa ni/ /oM dang hU~M gnyis rdo rje che/ /zhal brgyad zhabs ni bzhi pa ste/ /phyag ni bcu drug dag gis brgyan/ /bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa ste/ /phyed bcas pa yis gar

mkhan ni/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas do shal byas/ /sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag po che/ /g.yas pa ku mu da dang mtshungs/ /g.yon pa dmar po chen po 'jigs/ /phyi ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhis phyug /bdag med ma la bde ba ster/ /

glang po rta bong glang rnga mong / /mi dang seng ge de byi la/ /g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad po ni/ /dang po glang po rim shes bya/ /gzhi dang chu gnas rlung dang ni/ /me zla de nas snang byed dang / /phyi mthar byed dang nor sbyin ni/ /g.yon ba'i thod pa brgyad na'o/ /gau rI kha dog nag mo'o/ /chom rkun

ma ni btsod dang mtshungs/ /ro langs ma ni gser bsregs mdog /g+hasma rI ni margata mtshungs/ /puk+ka sI ni dbang sngon mo/ /ri khrod ma ni zla nor 'od/ /gtum mo nam mkha'i sngo bsangs ma/ /g.yung mo sna tshogs pa ru 'dod/ /gau rI g.yas na gri gug ste/ /g.yon na nya ni de bzhin

no/ /chom rkun ma g.yas cang te'u ste/ /g.yon na phag pa de bzhin no/ /ro langs ma g.yas rus sbal te/ /g.yon pa'i lag pa thod pa'o/ /za phod ma yi g.yas na sbrul/ /g.yon pa'i lag pa thod pa'o/ /puk+ka sI g.yas seng ge ste/ /g.yon pa'i phyag na dgra sta 'dzin/ /

ri khrod ma g.yas dge slong ste/ /g.yon pa na ni gsil byed shes/ /gtum mo g.yas na 'khor lo ste/ /g.yon na thod pa de bzhin no/ /g.yung mo g.yas na rdo rje ste/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub de bzhin no/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas/ /gau rI la sogs phyag gnyis

shes/ /spyan gsum skra ni gyen du yin/ /phyag rgya lnga yis shin tu mdzes/ /tshangs pa dbang po nye dbang drag /gshin rje nor gyi bdag po dang / /bden bral dang ni thags bzangs ris/ /gau rI la sogs pa yi gdan/ /thams cad rdo rje 'di yis ni/ /rang sngags yi ge

rdzogs pa dang / /phyag rgya phyag mtshan gyur pa las/ /snying gar ye shes bsam gtan bya/ /rang snying pad nyir hU~M rdo rje/ /hU~M ye shes sems dpa' bzhugs pa'i snying / /pad nyir gnas pa'i hU~M rdo rje/ /hU~M ye shes rjes su bsam pa'o/ /dam tshig 'khor lo la mnyam thim/ /

ye shes 'khor lo chen po 'bar/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /bsgrubs te gzhan yang du ma yin/ /dza hUM baM hoHbka' lung 'dis/ /gau rI la sogs bzhi po 'dis/ /dgug dang 'di ni gzhug pa dang / /bcing dang rjes su dgyes par bya/ /mig la sogs pa

gti mug sogs/ /rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum bsam/ /mig gnyis rdo rje gti mug ma/ /rna gnyis zhe sdang rdo rje ma/ /sna ni ser sna ma zhes brjod/ /kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma/ /lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma/ /yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /ming gi yi ge dang pos

bskyed/ /phyag gnyis zhal gcig bzang po yi/ /gri gug thod pa lag na bcas/ /sna tshogs mdog can ro yi gdan/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gnas su ni/ /oM AHhU~X ni 'di yi sngags/ /'di las mkha' spyod sa spyod ma/ /zhabs 'og gnas pa'i bsam gtan bya/ /sku

gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rigs gsum dngos/ /rang snying sa bon khyad par spro/ /lcags kyu'i gzugs kyi 'od zer gyis/ /sangs rgyas spyan drangs yang dag mchod/ /dbang bskur ba ni blang ba'o/ /mgon po de bzhin gshegs thams cad/ /khyed kyis

bdag la dbang bskur cig /de nas de bzhin gshegs 'di dag /he ru ka gzugs byas nas ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi chus gang ba'i/ /bum pa nyid kyi phyag gis bsnams/ /blugs te dbang bskur mtha' ru 'di'i/ /rtsa ba'i mi bskyod phyag rgya'o/ /de ni yang ni gau rI dang / /puk+ka

sI 'di'i phyag rgya'o/ /sangs rgyas rin chen dpag med yang / /phyi ma drug la gnyis gnyis rim/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ 'bud pa dang / 'bar ba dang / thod pa dang / lcags kyu lnga dang / sa bon lngar gyur pa'i bdud rtsi'i ro myong bar byed

pa la/ /rdo rje nas kyi 'bru tsam bsams te/ dpal kye rdo rje brtag pa'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a mr-i ta swa da na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ /ye shes mchod pa sna tshogs sogs/ /lha mo 'di brgyad mchod pa ni/ /spro zhing 'khor lo'i bdag po ni/ /'khor

lo'i bdag nyid pas sngon mchod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ rnal 'byor ma ni de dag gis/ /'khor lo'i gtso bo la bstod pa/ /khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rnams bskor/ /nyid kyi thugs kyis khyod dgongs grub/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'khor ba kun sgrub

pa/ /snying rje'i thugs kyis sems can byang chub tu/ /kun rdzob sgyu mas byang chub sgrub pa'i yid/ /dgyes pa'i shrI he ru ka rdo rje bstod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta stu ti badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ /rdo rje rjes su chags byed dang / /sangs rgyas gzhal med bye brag bsgom/ /

dbang bskur bdud rtsi myang ba dang / /mchod pa bstod pa yan lag drug /yan lag drug bsgom rnal 'byor gang / /de ni myur du dngos grub thob/ /pho brang sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /dbang ni mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs/ /bdud rtsi myang ba 'od dpag med/ /bstod

pa rin chen 'byung ldan dpal/ /mchod pa don yod yang dag mchod/ /rjes chags rdo rje sems dpa'o/ /dngos grub 'di ni nye ba yi/ /yan lag drug gis bskyed pa ni/ /dang po sprin dang 'dra ba mthong / /gnyis pa du ba 'dra ba ste/ /gsum pa glog gi rnam pa'o/ /bzhi pa mar me

'bar ba dang / /lnga pa thams cad snang ba ste/ /sprin med nam mkha' 'dra ba'o/ /phyis ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa mtshungs/ /rmi lam snang ba skad cig go/ /lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te/ /spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs pa/ /bsregs pas

haM las ri bong 'byung / /bsam gtan mi nus rnal 'byor gang / /don ni dag pa rjes su dran/ /snying rje spyan ni dmar po ste/ /yan lag nag po byams pa'i thugs/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi pa ni/ /zhabs ni rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod/ /zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa yin/ /bcu drug phyag

ni stong pa ste/ /phyag rgya lnga ni sangs rgyas yin/ /khro bo gdug pa 'dul ba po/ /spyan gsum po ni sku gsum mo/ /rus pa bden pa bzhi pa'o/ /gzugs ni rdo rje ma yin te/ /tshor ba gsang ba'i gau rI ma/ /de bzhin chu ma 'du shes phung / /'du byed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /rnam shes

'di ni bdag med ma/ /don dam la ni phung po med/ /de ni yan lag drug tu 'gyur/ /skye mched drug ni dag pa yi/ /zhe sdang rdo rje rdo rje ma/ /rdo rje ro ma 'bab ri yin/ /phrag dog rdo rje ma de bzhin/ /gti mug rdo rje ma yang ni/ /yin te rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /ser sna gsang ba'i gau rI ma/ /yid

la bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /sa ni puk+ka sI ru brjod/ /chu rnams ri khrod ma zhes zer/ /drod ni gtum mor shes par bya/ /rlung ni g.yung mor rab tu brjod/ /gzugs ni gau rIr yang dag bshad/ /sgra ni chom rkun ma ru bshad/ /so so'i dri ni langs ma/ /ro yi tshul ni za phod ma/ /reg

bya sa spyod ma zhes brjod/ /chos kyi khams ni mkha' spyod ma/ /sa ni dang por nor sbyin mtha'/ /phyug po thams cad sa 'grub bo/ /glang po la sogs 'dzin pa ni/ /nad ni nye bar zhi ba'o/ /glo dang dbugs dang de bzhin smyo/ /khrag skyugs mdze nad birdzi ka /mcher pa mchin pa rang

gzugs ni/ /glang po la sogs rab tu brjod/ /ni raM su 'am gzhan las ni/ /bsam gtan sngags kyi bzlas pa bya/ /oM aSh+TA na nA ya biM gor+d+ha ke sha war+t+ma ne/ tsa turbiM sha ti/ ne trA ya/ sho Da sha b+hu dzA ya/ kr-iSh+Na dzI mU ta wa pu She/ ka pA la mA lA ne kA d+hA ri Ne/ At+mA ta krU ra tsit+tA ya ar+d+hen+du

daMSh+T+r-i Ne/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ kA ra ya kA ra ya/ gar+dz+dza ya gar+dz+dza ya/ tar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+dza ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ sap+ta sA ga rA na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ nA gASh+Ta kAn/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sarba sha trUM/ ha hA hi hI hu hU he hai ho hau haM haHphaT swA hA/ bar chad thams cad nyer zhi'i phyir/ /gtor ma rgyun du sbyin par bya/ /oM

in+daM dza ma dza la dzak+kha b+hU ta bah+ni bA u rAk+kha tsan+da sudz+dza ma da bap+pa ta la pA tA le aSh+Ta sap+pa swA hA/ i daM ba liM b+huM dza dziM g+ha phul+la d+hUp+pa mAM sa piM ga am+b+ha sap+pa kadz+dza sA da/ khan+ti khu Ni/ phe Ta gA da/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+har+m+mA NAM/ Ad+ya nut+pan+na twAta oM AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ /lha mo'i rgyud kyi pad+ma mang po ni/ /

@#/ /bla ma zhi bas nyi ma'i 'od kyis phye/ /mi thub zla bas sbrang rtsi gzhibs 'thungs bas/ /sgrub pa'i thabs ni sbrang rtsi skyugs pa'o/ /dpal gyi thugs rje'i stobs kyis sgrub thabs byas/ /'di las ngal bar gyur pa'i bsod nams gang / /des thob skye ba'i rgya

mtsho las sgrol ba'i/ /theg pa 'gro ba sgrol ba'i rgyur gyur cig /yan lag drug pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon mi thub zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bla ma dam pas bka' stsal pa/ /dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis/ /yan lag drug pa'i sgrub thabs 'di/ /

shAkya dkon mchog bdag med la/ /rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad phyir/ /nus pas bsgyur ba gang yod pa/ /kye yi rdo rje myur thob shog /rgya gar gyi mkhan po rat+na shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas dang / dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/

su pa ri gra ha nA ma maN+Da la no pi ka bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs bzang po yongs su gzung ba zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor ba 'jig pa'i me 'byung nad dang mya ngan 'phreng ba'i 'od 'phro par/ /lhung bas

chu bur nad 'gyur bzlog dkas 'gro ba nyam thag zhi bya'i phyir/ /snying rje bdud rtsi'i char gyi chus gang 'gro la byams pa'i chu bo ni/ /gang 'di kun du rab 'bab sangs rgyas bcom ldan de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyud kun don gyi cho ga ni/ /rgyas par rig pa yod min te/ /rgyud kun

don gyi cho ga ni/ /bsgrub par nus pa ma yin no/ /de phyir tha snyad tsam gyis ni/ /rjes 'jug spros pa ma yin no/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bdag gis ni/ /legs par bsdu ba 'di rtsom mo/ /slob dpon rnyed dang bkur ma phrogs/ /bya ba mkhas shing dkyil 'khor mthong / /sgrub

sprul legs par bsngags pa yi/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /zhi dang rgyas dang rab gnas sogs/ /'dod pa'i don ni byed nus pa'i/ slob ma gnyis sam gsum gyi bar/ /dkyil 'khor bri phyir gsal ba gdab/ /tshogs 'phel bar dang bgegs zhi'i phyir/ /

thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam shes pas/ /sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba yin/ /bsnyen pa med na 'grub mi 'gyur/ /gnas kyi bye brag rig pa yis/ /'phral du dben par 'dug nas ni/ /lha yi 'khor lo bsgom par bya/ /dub na de yis gsang sngags bzlas/ /'khor lo can gyi

sngags 'bum bzlas/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha yi 'bum/ /gzhan rnams kyi ni khri nyid de/ /dngos grub mtshan ma mchog thob nas/ /rang gi lus la dkyil 'khor bsdu/ /'di ni sngon du bsnyen par brjod/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'o/ /bsnyen pas bgegs kyi tshogs bcom ste/ /sa

ni yongs su gzung bar bya/ /ri bo grong dang grong khyer dang / /sa phyogs yid ni dga' ba ru/ /rus pa thal ba zug rngu rdo/ /bshang bas ma dag gzhan du bgrod/ /u dum wA ra n+ya gro a shwa ta tha/ /ba la sha dang ba ku lArdzu na/ /ldan pa rus sbal rgyab dang 'dra ba yi/ /sa ni drug po

rnam par spang bar bya/ /chu ni g.yas su 'khor ba dang / /shar dang byang du gzhol ba'i sa/ /zur ni bzhi ste dkar 'dra ba/ /brkos nas des bkang lhag gyur pa'o/ /sngags pa rdo rje dril 'dzin pas/ /snying rjes gang ba'i yid dang bcas/ /g.yon brkyang pa yi tshul gyis

gnas/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bsal bar bya/ /khru phyed brkos nas chu yis dgang / /gom pa brgya ru 'gro bar bya/ /myur du 'ongs nas blta bya ste/ /de bzhin 'dug na lhag par bsngags/ /der ni sa bdag zhing skyong ba/ /la sogs pa ni gtor ma sbyin/ /de nas

sngags dang phyag rgya ru/ /bcas pas sa ni bslang bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /gnyi ga mtshams kyi mtha' ru gzung / /sa bzang po 'di bdag stsol cig /ces pas bslang bar bya ba yin/ /oM hU~M dzraM dzraM swA hA/ sa bslang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /dge dang

mi dge'i mtshan ma dang / /rjes mthun phyi de'i nyi ma la/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ba 'am/ /yang na bgegs rnams gzhom par bya/ /sa 'dzin lta bur brtan pa'i blos/ /srung ba'i 'khor los sa legs bsrung / /pus mo lte ba rked tsam du/ /dngos grub rjes mthun brko bar

bya/ /dgun zlar ba la sogs nas/ /brtsams te zla ba gsum gsum du/ /lto 'phye lho dang nub dang byang / /shar du de yi mgo bo ste/ /g.yon pa'i zur gyis nyal ba yin/ /'di yi lto ba shes nas brko/ /mgo bo rgyab sogs nas brkos pa'i/ /skyon

ni rgyas la las shes bya/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i sa brko ba'i cho ga'o/ /phub ma rdo dang gseg ma dang / /sol ba la sogs dor byas te/ /rin chen 'bru sman nang du gzhug /shin tu 'thas par brdung par bya/ /zug rngu'i nyas pa thams cad ni/ /gal te bsal

bar ma nus na/ /lag pas mnan te gsang sngags bzla'o/ /de nyid stobs ldan dag par 'gyur/ /oM ha na ha na kro ta hU~M phaT/ sa sbyang ba'i sngags so/ /dri chus gtor zhing dag pa yi/ /sa 'di yongs su gzung bar bya/ /mtshan mo lnga ni ma chad par/ /rdo rje slob dpon

gyis bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /nu ma gnyis kyi mdun bzhag nas/ /thams cad kun ni bskrad byas te/ /de rjes sar ni 'jug par bya/ /oM a pa sa ran+tu b+ha ban+to yi ge tsi ta s+tha na swa mi na/ de ba nA ga/ yak+Sha di gan+d+ha rba b+hU ta/ b+hU ta ni/ DA ki ni/ satwa atha kr-i ya

a pa raM ba ga tsha traM si graM me wan+tu/ oM hUM phaT/ bskrad pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje sa gzhi ra ba dang / dra ba dag dang bla re dang / mda' yi dra ba phyi rol du/ /me ri yang ni byin gyis brlabs/ /oM me dI nI badzri b+ha ba badzra ban+d+ha hU~M/ oM badzra prA ka ra hU~M baM hU~M/ oM badzra pany+tsa ra hU~M yaM hU~M/ oM badzra bi d+ha na

hU~M khaM hU~M/ oM badzra sa ra dz+wa la tra saM traM/ oM badzra dz+wa la a na lArka hU~M hU~M hU~M/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga wAn badzra rA dzA hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TaM big+hA hU~M phaT/ oM kI la

ya kI la ya sarba pA paM hU~M phaT/ oM hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha ra adz+nyA pa ya ti/ sarba big+h+nAM kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra kI la ya kI la ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra hU~M mung+ga ra badzra kI la ya/ A ko Ta ya hU~M phaT/ sngags tshig grub pa 'di rnams kyis/ /'bar ba'i me yi phyi rol du/ /khro

bo'i rnam pa'i phur bu ni/ /lugs su 'byung dang lugs min pas/ /bgegs rnams kyi ni spyi bor gdab/ /phur pa la sogs cho ga'o/ /rdo rje dril bu la sogs kyi/ /de nyid rnams dang mchod yon sogs/ /cho ga rgyas pa'i dam tshig ni/ /sgo skyong las kyi rdo rjes gdab/ /sor

mo brgyad pa nas brtsams te/ /nyi shu'i bar du grangs mnyam bya/ /gser dang 'jon dmar sogs byung ba'i/ /rdo rje rnam pa gsum ni bzung / /rtse gsum pa dang rtse lnga pa/ /rtse dgu pa ste rnam pa gsum/ /zhi dang ma zhi rab phyed pas/ /yang ni rnam pa gnyis su brjod/ /bzhi pa sna

tshogs rdo rje nyid/ /rtse mo lnga pa gdong bzhi yin/ /dbus ma gzung ba'i gnas yin te/ /mtha' ma'i rtse mo de yi tshad/ /dbus ma'i rwa ni nas gzugs mtshungs/ /phyogs kyi cha las ma 'das par/ /tha ma chu srin mche ba'i rtse/ /chu srin kha nas byung ba yin/ /rtsa sbom rtse mo byin

gyis phra/ /rno zhing rim gyis mgo bo gug /rwa rnams kyi ni nang gi char/ /dbus kyi rwa dang bar mtshams bya/ /rdo rje rjes su mthun pa ru/ /sor mo gnyis cha bskyed 'bri bya/ /rtse mo phan tshun mnyam bya zhing / /dbu ma las ni cung zad thung / /ra brgyad rtsa ba'i yan lag tu/ /pad+ma kha bye

pad+ma brtag /dbus kyi cha las cung zad tsam/ /lhag par ska rags bya ba yin/ /phan tshun mnyam pa'i lhag ma ni/ /rim gyis nyis 'gyur mthon po yin/ /chu skyes 'dab brgyad mdzes pa yis/ /mgo dang zhabs su phreng ba gnyis/ /zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje'i mtshan nyid do/ /

dbus su rnam snang mi bskyod pa/ /shar yin de bzhin rin chen lhor/ /nub dang byang gi ra dag la/ /'od dpag med dang don yod grub/ /'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dag pa/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad 'dab ma la/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyad yin te/ /mtshan ma gsal bar blta

bar bya/ /phyag na pad+ma byams pa dang / /nam mkha'i mdzod dang bzang po'i gsungs/ /gnod sbyin bdag po 'jam pa'i dpal/ /sgrib pa sel dang sa snying nyid/ /dbu ma kun gyi gzhir gnas te/ /sangs rgyas snying po za ma tog /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa ma/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog

sgrol ma'o/ /mtshams su skul byed rin chen glog /lu gu rgyud ma gzhan mi thub/ /pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma ru gsungs/ /rwa la yang dag gnas brjod pa/ /shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /byang du 'jigs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /nub tu ro langs mar shes

bya/ /lho ru gtum mo dran par bya/ /dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/ /rdo rje'i de nyid 'dir 'dod do/ /dril bu kun du cha drug la/ /de yi cha bzhi 'khar ba yi/ /rang bzhin ma 'dres pa la bya/ /gzhan ni gzhan las brtag par bya/ /dril bu de yi nang gi mkha'/ /zheng dang chu ru

mnyam pa yi/ /phreng ba ut+pal mtshan ma brgyad/ /steng dbus rim pa ji bzhin du/ /cho gas 'dab ma brgyad mtshan pa/ /ut+pal steng gi cha gcig la/ /phreng ba gsum gnas de steng du/ /bum pa gser ram zangs ma 'am/ /dngul lam ra gan las byas pa'o/ /de yi steng

du de tshad tsam/ /shar bltas shes rab gdong ba bya/ /gdong steng rdo rje phyed pa ste/ /sngon gyi rdo rje phyed lta bu/ /de ltar sor brgyad la sogs pa'i/ /dril bu rdo rje'i rjes mthun bya/ /cung zad chu skyes kha phye ba'i/ /khar gyur yang ni ba lang mchu/ /zhes bya ba 'di ni dril bu'i mtshan nyid

do/ /phyogs mtshams brgyad du blta bya ba/ /lha rnams sa bon rnam par bsgom/ /shar du lha mo sgrol ma ste/ /gos dkar mo ni byang du yin/ /nub tu mA ma kIr shes bya/ /lho ru sangs rgyas spyan ma'o/ /mdog bzangs dmar dang 'od ma can/ /rdo rje phreng ba mtshams nyid do/ /

nang na gnas pa'i nam mkha' ni/ /gzugs med pa yi khams dag pa'o/ /gzugs khams rnam par dag pa 'di'i/ /ut+pal rtsa ba kha bye ba/ /shes rab bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gnas/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i gzhi/ /steng gi chu skyes rdo rje ni/ /rdo rje lta bur rnam par

bsam/ /dbus kyi dbyug pa ye shes te/ /thams cad sdud cing spro bar byed/ /pad+ma'i bskor ba rnam pa lngas/ /gnas brgyad rnams su dkrol bar bya/ /zhes bya ba 'di ni dril bu'i de kho na nyid do/ /gser sogs rdzas dang mchod sbyin shing / /yang na ni ma pa'i shing las ni/ /

dgang gzar ring tshad khru do pa/ /de ye dbye ba bshad par bya/ /chu zheng sor mo brgyad pa la/ /khung bu de phyed mnyam pa brko/ /brkos pa dang mnyam rdo rje bru/ /kha ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma mtshungs/ /mu khyud kyang ni gru bzhi ste/ /kun du sor mo bzhi yin no/ /sor gnyis brkos pa de tshad

la/ /rdo rje rtse gsum pa nang du/ /'di yi khu bcud 'dzag pa yi/ /bu ga mthe'u chung tshad tsam yin/ /ska rags 'og tu de yi tshad/ /mdzes pa 'dab ma dag gi gnas/ /smyo byed me tog dang mtshungs pa/ /yu ba'i mgo bo dag tu bya/ /yu 'og sor gnyis rin po che/ /tha mar rdo rje

sor drug pa/ /zhes bya ba 'di ni dgang gzar gyi mtshan nyid do/ /phyed bcas khru gang blugs gzar du/ /zhes bya 'di yi kha sor drug /chu skyes 'dab ma'i rnam pa mtshungs/ /de yi dbus su zheng zabs su/ /sor gsum bru bya de tshad tsam/ /rtse lnga pa yi rdo rjes mdzes/ /sor

gnyis mdzes par byed pa'i gnas/ /rin chen sor gcig shes par bya/ /dgang gzar yu ba chang ba yis/ /gzung bar 'dor ba'i tshad tsam yin/ /cung zad phra ba blugs gzar gyi/ /rdo rje sor gsum bya ba'o/ /'di ni blugs gzar gyi mtshan nyid do/ /gser dang dngul

dang nya phyis dung / /rdo dang shing dang zangs ma'i snod/ /'di dag mchod yon snod yin te/ /mthar yang 'dab ma'i snod sbyar bya/ /mchod yon gyi snod bstan pa yin no/ /dri yi chu dang 'o ma mngar/ /chu gtsang me tog dkar po rnams/ /ji ltar rnyed snod nang bzhag ste/ /spos

bdug gsang sngags mngon par bzlas/ /'di ni mchod yon sgrub pa'i cho ga'o/ /dkar po ser po dmar po ljang / /zhi dang rgyas sogs sgrub pa la/ /las dang rjes su mthun pa'i dri/ /chu la sogs pa de bzhin sbyar/ /mchod yon gyi dbye ba'i cho ga'o/ /me tog spos

dang mar me dang / /dri yi dung sogs g.yas su gzhag /g.yon du sngags kyi mchod yon sngon/ /mdun du yang ni snod gzhag bya/ /mchod yon gyi snod la sogs pa dgod pa'o/ /yi ge gsum mam yi ge lnga/ /ji ltar rgyud du bstan pa'i sngags/ /ji ltar las

kyi rjes mthun par/ /mchod yon la sogs sngags su bya/ /zhi la mtha' ru ba shaM ste/ /rgyas la mtha' ma bau ShaT te/ /bsad la hU~M phaT mtha' mar te/ /dgug dang dbang la dzaHdang hriH/ /mchod yon la sogs pa'i sngags yin no/ /dang por

dri chu sbyin par bya/ /gnyis pa la ni 'o ma mngar/ /gsum pa nyid la chu gtsang ste/ /bzhi par me tog sbyar bar bya/ /dung gi kha yi dri yi chu/ /zhabs rtsa dag la dbul bar bya/ /oM ni ri ti hU~M khaM zhabs bsil gyi sngags so/ /'thor 'thung la ni 'o ma dang / /mngar

ba yin no bsang gtor ni/ /chu gtsang 'ba' zhig ku sha yi/ /chun po mchod yon sngags bzla'o/ /oM sar+b+ba saM sho d+ha ni hU~M phaT/ zhal bsil dang bsang gtor gyi sngags so/ /ye shes dkar pos me tog ni/ /blangs nas mtha' sogs rim gyis dbye/ /zhabs bsil zhal

bsil bzed zhal ni/ /chol zangs sam ni lcags kyi snod/ /gser dang dngul sogs rdzas gzhan las/ /byas pa'i snod ni man 'jir bzhag /zhabs bsil la sogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba'o/ /zhabs bsil zhal bsil bsang gtor sogs/ /rim pa

bzhin du dbul bar bya/ /'di kun mchod yon yan lag phyir/ /mchod yon sgra ru bshad pa yin/ /mchod yon dbul ba'i cho ga'i rim/ /khu tshur mnyam par dam bcings te/ /gung mo gnyis brkyang rtse mo sbyar/ /ar+g+haM chen por rab tu bstan/ /oM pra tIts+tsha ar+g+haM hUM swA

hA/ mchod yon dbul ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil sngags yungs kar bzla/ /khu tshur gnyis kyis 'dod lha la/ /rang gi bskor bas rab bskor te/ /gnyis gnyis bar du sbyang bar bya/ /cig car khu tshur gnyis dag gis/ /g.yas su bskor ba yang

bya'o/ /sngon bzhin yungs kar me snod la/ /sbyang bar bya phyir gzhug par bya/ /oM sar+b+ba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya badzra satwa s+ya sar+b+ba pA paM da ha swA hA/ 'di ni sbyang ba'i cho ga'o/ /ye shes rnam shes nang bkug ste/ /snyim pas chu ni blang byas nas/ /de bzhin bskor te sbyang phyir mer/ /

yungs kar bzhin du gzhug par bya/ /oM hUM ta Ti phaT/ nye reg gi cho ga'o/ /zla 'od an+d+ri nI la dang / /pu sha rA ga dmar nor bu/ /margata mchog ste de rnams kyi/ /phye ma rin chen rdul tshon mchog /gser dang dngul dang mu tig dang / /rgyal po 'khyil ba byu ru rnams/ /

'di dag rin chen lnga ru bshad/ /yal ga lnga po bshad par bya/ /'dzam bu dang ni ka dam pa/ /bil ba dang ni a mra dang / /pi dza pu ra las byung ba'o/ /til dang gro dang sran ma 'bras/ /nas rnams 'bru lngar shes par bya/ /ha sa de ba ka pi ra/ kre taM dza li br-i ha pa la/ 'di

dag sman bzhir shes par bya/ /lnga pa kar+Ni ka yin no/ /kaN+Da ka ri br-i ha ti/ ha sa de ba ha sa dang / se te a pa ra dzi dang / 'di dag cig shos sman gyi tshogs/ /tsan+dan gnyis dang gur kum dang / /la ku dran thi ka dang lnga/ /'di dag dri lngar bstan pa ste/ /lha la khrus gsol bshad

pa yin/ /u dum+bA ra shi ri Sha/ a shwat+tha dang n+ya gro d+ha/ /par ka ti yi shun lpags lngas/ /lha khrus gsol ba'i mar khu bsal/ /ba yi mar dang lci ba chu/ /zho dang 'o ma yang dag bsres/ /'di dag pa yi lngar shes bya/ /lha rnams khrus gsol sgrub pa yin/ /sangs rgyas

byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /yang dag mnyes par bya ba ste/ /rtag tu dam tshig rig pa yis/ /dam tshig mchod pas mchod par bya/ /glu ni rdo rje can la dbul/ /gar ni sangs rgyas rnams la dbul/ /ha ri mchog la de bzhin dri/ /'jig rten rje la bza' dang btung / /

gos kyi mchod pa rta mchog la/ /'di dag dam tshig mchog yin no/ /hU~M rdo rje las byung ba'i dri/ /a ka ru nag he ru ka /tsan+dan dkar po rtag pa la/ /dmar po 'jig rten rje la dbul/ /kha che rdo rje snang ba la/ /bdun gyi rgyal po thams cad do/ /kha dang tsha ba rdo rjer dbul/ /mngar

ba rdo rje rtag pa la/ /skyur ba rdo rje nyi ma la/ /de bzhin lan tshwa 'jig rten rjer/ /rta yi rgyal po thams cad dam/ /bska ba rab tu brtag par bya/ /shing byung me tog nag mdzes pa/ /kye yi rdo rje 'chang ba la'o/ /ma li ka dang ma la ti/ /kun+da rtag tu sangs rgyas dbul/ /shing dbang

mchog dang dri med pa/ /snang byed la ni dbul bar bya/ /ut+pal dmar po chu skyes dang / /ban+du dmar po pa ta la/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang la dbul/ /thams cad rdo rje rta mchog la'o/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor byas te/ /mi mthun phyogs bskrad nges pa yis/ /sa yi dbus

su 'dug nas ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams la gsol ba gdab/ /ji srid 'khor lo yongs rdzogs par/ /bdag cag bsrung ba bya ba'i phyir/ /sa 'di byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /bde bar gshegs pas deng nyid 'os/ /'gal ba'i sems can rtsom pa'i tshogs/ /mkhas pa khros pas

rnam par gzhol/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi mig dag la/ /ma las nyi ma Ta las zla/ /rkang 'og rdo rje spro ba yi/ /'od zer rnams kyis klu sogs bsregs/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pas/ /rdo rje gsor ba rol byed cing / /gnas rnams su ni dril bu brdungs/ /rgyun du

mthug pa'i hU~M sgra sgrogs/ /mkhas pas g.yas su bskor byas te/ /phyogs bzhi rnams su yongs su bskor/ /'gyur dang bcas shing sgeg pa mchog /dang por rol bcas rjes rgyu bas/ /rkang stabs brgyad du cho ga yis/ /rdo rje gom pas gar bya'o/ /me tog snying po'i sbyor ba

bya/ /spos la yal ga'i sbyor ba nyid/ /mar me sdong bu'i lag tshul dang / /byug pa'i tshul gyis byug pa dang / /lag pas mig dang de bzhin rna/ /rkang pa zung gis g.yas phyogs su/ /bskor te pheg rdob sbyor ba yis/ /de bzhin du yang g.yon du bskor/ /de nas rgyun gyi

gar byas te/ /de rjes bskyod pa'i gar bya'o/ /myur brdebs de bzhin gar byas te/ /'khor lo lta bur 'khor bar bya/ /g.yas brkyang ba dang / g.yon brkyang ba dang / mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dang / rdo rje'i rkang stabs dang / zlum po dang / sna tshogs gcod pa dang / rus

sbal gyi rkang stabs dang / /bung ba 'phur ba lta bu zhes bya ba ni/ rkang stabs brgyad do/ /rgya mtsho bskyod pa dang / ri bo 'degs pa dang / mdzes pa'i gom pa dang / khro bo'i gom pa ste rkang stabs kyi bkod pa'o/ /rdo rje'i tshul dang / 'khor lo'i tshul dang / rin po che'i tshul

dang / pad+ma'i tshul dang / ral gri'i tshul dang / mdung gi tshul dang / gzhu'i tshul dang / dbyug pa'i tshul dang / dbyug pa'i tshul dang / tho ba'i tshul dang / gtun shing gi tshul dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i tshul dang / kha bcu pa'i tshul dang / ral gri'i phru gu'i tshul dang / sna tshogs dbyig pa'i tshul dang /

mdung thung gi tshul dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa'i tshul zhes bya ba ni tshul bcu drug go/ /ba dan gnyis pa dang / ba dan gsum pa dang / me tog gi tshul dang / spos kyi tshul dang / mar me'i tshul dang / dri'i tshul dang / lA s+ye'i lag pa dang / phreng ba'i lag pa dang / glu'i lag

pa dang / gar gyi lag pa dang / gling bu'i lag pa dang / pi wang gi lag pa dang / rdza rnga'i lag pa dang / mu kuN+Da'i lag pa dang / bya ba mtha' yas pa'i lag pa'i bkod pa'o/ /rdo rje'i skyil krung dang / sems dpa'i skyil krung dang / pad+ma'i skyil krung dang / bzang po'i 'dug

stangs dang / skyil krung phyed pa dang / bkra shis kyi 'dug stangs te/ 'dug stangs kyi bkod pa'o/ /sgeg pa'i ro dang / dpa' bo'i ro dang / mi sdug pa'i ro dang / drag po'i ro dang / rgad po'i ro dang / 'jigs su rung ba'i ro dang / zhi ba'i ro dang / rngam pa'i ro dang / snying rje ba'i ro

zhes bya ba ni gar gyi ro dgu'o/ /tha hi tha hi/ tha ga tha ga/ /thu ma thu ma/ tha ma tha ma/ tho ho tho ho/ /ci hi ci hi/ d+ha d+haM d+ha d+haM/ kra ka kra ka/ /tha ka tha ka/ DiM hi DiM hi/ ta Ta wa ta Ta wa/ traM/ cang te'u cha lang rnga rings dang / rdza rnga phyed pa de bzhin no/ /gling bu pi ldir yang de bzhin/ /pi wang rgyud

mangs rgyud gcig pa/ rnam gsum dbye bas brdung bar bya/ /dal ba drag po myur ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs gnas rnams su/ /mchod pa 'di ni bla na med/ /'di dag ni rol mo'i bkod pa yin no/ /drug gi rjes su skyes pa'i glu dang / /drang srong gi rjes kyi glu dang / sa 'dzin gyi

rjes kyi glu dang / bar ma'i rjes kyi glu dang / lnga pa'i rjes kyi glu dang / blo gsal gyi rjes kyi glu dang / 'khor mnyam pa'i rjes kyi glu dang / /dal ba'i dbye ba dang / drag po'i dbye ba dang / rdzogs par dbye ba dang / zab par dbye ba dang / phyed phri ba dang / rnam par 'dres pa dang / dkyugs

gnyis len par byed pa dang / dkyugs gsum len par byed pa dang / mgrin par sgrogs pa dang / rkan du sgrogs pa dang / lcer sgrogs pa dang / sor sgrogs pa ste/ 'di dag ni glu'i bkod pa yin no/ /sa gzhi yongs su gzung ba'i tshe/ /dam tshig

'di dag rab tu bskul/ /las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub phyir/ /slob dpon rdo rje 'chang bas bya/ /rdo rje sa sogs grub rjes su/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i/ /chos 'byung bsgom bya de nang du/ /hri las byung ba'i pad+ma ste/ /pad stengs a las byung ba yi/ /kun du

bltas pa'i rdo rje yin/ /rdo rje'i steng du rlung la sogs/ /de steng b+h+rUM las 'khor lo nyid/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /'byung bzhi'i bdag nyid dkyil 'khor ro/ /de steng sangs rgyas yongs bsgoms te/ /spro zhing gzhal yas khang 'bar dgod/ /rgyal mtshan ba dan

la sogs mdzes/ /pho brang nyams dga' bsgom par bya/ /dkar po gser sogs phye ma yis/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya/ /las kun byed pa zhes bya ba'i/ /bum pa lte ba'i dbus su gzhag /tshon sna lnga yi srad bu ni/ /shar gyi 'dab mar rnam par dgod/ /lho ru rdo rje gzhag

par bya/ /de bzhin byang du dril bu'o/ /bdud rtsi lngas gang dung phor ni/ /shar las gzhan pa'i 'dab mar dgod/ /rdul tshon sangs rgyas lnga yi cha/ /'bar ba re re tha dad pa'i/ /snod du gzhag par byas nas ni/ /so so'i mtshams su gzhag par bya/ /sku dang gdan rnams ji lta bar/ /bum

par rdo rje 'chang ba bsgom/ /mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag mchod/ /sngags dang phyag rgya bskul bar bya/ /khu tshur gnyis ka dam bcings te/ /ro tsa na dang dkar po brkyang / /rtse mo rtse mo sbyar ba nyid/ /snying po'i phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /oM AH swA hA/ snying po'i phyag rgya dang sngags

so/ /rdo rje rtse yis bum reg nas/ /gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas/ /oM hU~M swA hA sngags so/ /chu des rdul tshon thig skud la/ /gtor nas mchod dang gtor ma sbyin/ /rang gi bdag po'i gsang sngags bzla/ /sku yang bsgom par bya ba yin/ /spro zhing 'khor lo bsdu bar bya/ /

mtshan mo skad cig der gnas bya/ /'di dag ni sa yongs su gzung ba yin no// //rnal 'byor bdag nyid tho rangs langs/ /lus kyi bya ba kun byas te/ /bum pa sogs bsdus dkyil 'khor sa'i/ /lho phyogs cha ru gzhag par bya/ /yang ni dri yis nyer byugs te/ /baM las byung ba'i

lha mo bsam/ /phyag gnyis bum pa bzang po 'dzin/ /sku mdog ser po'i 'od ldan zhing / /ye shes rdzogs pa yang dag mchod/ /lhag par gnas nas gshegs su gsol/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang / /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha

mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /dngos grub thams cad thob bya'i phyir/ /bdag gis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /zhes lan gsum brjod de sa'i lha mo gshegs su gsol lo/ /lus khrus bya zhing dri yis byugs/ /ji snyed 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /ser po'i gos ni bgos nas ni/ /

phyi dro'i dus su 'jug par bya/ /dri dang me tog gcal bkram pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su 'dug byas te/ /bdag nyid 'dod pa'i lhar bsgoms la/ /spro dang bcas pas spros bzung nas/ /yan lag kun gyis rab btud de/ /rgyal ba rnams la gsol ba gdab/ /ma lus

phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /rdo rje 'chang chen che ge mo/ /bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'bri bar 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas la sogs kun gshegs te/ /dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol/ /'di ni sangs rgyas la gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /slob

dpon rdo rje sems mtshungs la/ /phyi nas rtag sogs rgyal ba dang / /mnyam pa rdo rje dril 'chang ba'i/ /slob ma rnams kyis gsol ba gdab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa

bshad du gsol/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan min thams cad rnam par spangs/ /kun du bzang po sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung / /ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba/ /kun du bzang po gsung gi

mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /sems can don gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/ /kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /yang na tshigs bcad gcig pa 'di/ /bzhi yis

mgrin gcig brjod par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor 'dren pas bshad du gsol/ /de nas langs te nam mkha' la/ /bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la btud de/ /bdag nyid

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sbyor bas nga rgyal bskyed par bya/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' bdag /rdo rje nyi ma bdag nyid de/ /don yod rdo rje chos bdag nyid/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid yin/ /hU~M badzro tiSh+Tha'i sngags kyis/ /rang gi mngon sprul 'khor lo ni/ /nam

mkhar bteg par byas nas kyang / /rdo rje'i gar gyis kun du bskor/ /sngar bshad pa yi sngags kyis ni/ /rdo rjes gzhi'i rang bzhin bya/ /ra ba nyid dang dra ba dang / /bla re la sogs sngar bzhin bya/ /phur bu la ni khyad par du/ /phur pa sor mo bco brgyad pa'am/ /yang na sor ni bcu

gnyis pa/ /sboms su sor drug sor bzhi pa/ /seng ldeng rus pa lcags las byas/ /tsan+dan dmar pos byug par bya/ /phreng ba cod pan dmar pos mdzes/ /chang pa g.yon pas gzung bar bya/ /phur bu'i mgo ru tho ba ni/ /bzhag pa lag pa cig shos kyis/ /sngon gyi sngags

kyis brdungs byas te/ /shar sogs gnas su gdab par bya/ /yang na sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /phur bu ra ba dra rnams bya/ /lag pa'i mthil ni steng bstan te/ /bzlog nas sa la brdab par bya/ /oM badzra hU~M phaT/ rdo rje phur bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /lag gnyis lu gu

rgyud bcas te/ /gyen du brkyang nas phyi ru bzlog /oM hU~M phaT dra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /lag gnyis khu tshur byas nas ni/ /ye shes pad+ma brkyang bar bya/ /sa gdugs dang ni rnam shes brgyad/ /ye shes dang ni rnam shes sbyar/ /sa gdugs pad+ma sbyar byas te/ /phyogs

mtshams brgyad du bskor bar bya/ /oM dzaM b+ha ni hU~M phaT/ ra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ /bum pa lhag par gnas par bya/ /bum pa rtsa ba nag po sogs/ /spangs pa mdun du dgod par bya/ /mgrin pa ring ba lto che ba/ /yal ga bzang

pos kha rnams mdzes/ /'o ma dri chu la sogs pas/ /gang ba mgul bar ras kyis dkri/ /rjes su mthun pa brtan byas te/ /dkyil 'khor khang par gzhag par bya/ /dngos grub brgyad don 'dod byed phyir/ /lan bdun bar du bzlas pa yin/ /oM tap+te tap+te ma ha tap+te swA hA/ /

gang+gA'i chu dgug pa'i sngags so/ /sa gdugs dang ni rnam shes sbyar/ /lhag ma thams cad brkyang byas pas/ /bum par red nas gsang sngags 'dis/ /lan bdun bar du mngon par bzlas/ /oM suM k+ShuM yuM hU~M phaT swA hA/ sgo'i bum pa'i lhag par gnas pa'o/ /dri med

thig gis btab pa yis/ /'khor lo yi ni sgo bzhi ru/ /shar phyogs sgo nas brtsams byas te/ /bum pa rnams ni dgod par bya/ /rgyal ba dang ni bkra shis zhes/ /bya ba shar sgo'i logs gnyis la/ /lho ru dngos grub srung bar bshad/ /nub tu rgyal dang zhi ba ste/ /byang du dngos

grub rdzu 'phrul te/ /dngos grub rin chen dbul ba'o/ /gang zhig 'dir ni lha yi gnas/ /dkyil 'khor gang du nges pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor de ni dri lnga 'am/ /yang na gzhan gyis byug par bya/ /rang gi sngags kyis yig sprul pas/ /lha yi 'khor lo dgod par bya/ /

dgug par bya ba'i sbyor bas der/ /ye shes 'khor lo dgug par bya/ /de nas mchod pa rnam pa lngas/ /rgyal ba dad pas yang dag mchod/ /dkyil 'khor ji srid rdzogs kyi bar/ /byin brlab don du gsol ba gdab/ /thugs brtse'i phan pa'i dgongs pa can/ /sangs rgyas

bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /sngags dang bcas par gshegs nas ni/ /sa gzhi yongs su gzung bar mdzad/ /rdo rje 'chang chen bdag ming 'di/ /dkyil 'khor che ge mo bskyed phyir/ /ci nus pa yi nyer spyod kyis/ /nang par nam langs dkyil 'khor 'bri/ /slob ma rjes

su gzung ba dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod bgyid na/ /rjes su brtse ba bskyed nas ni/ /bsnyen te bzhugs par mdzad pa'i rigs/ /zhes lan gsum brjod de dkyil 'khor gyi lha lhag par gnas pa'o// //de nas slob ma khrus byas te/ /gtsang

ma'i gos ni bgos pa yis/ /me tog snyim thogs phyag 'tshal nas/ /bla ma la ni gsol gdab bya/ /skye rga na dang 'chi ba yi/ /chu srin la sogs 'jigs bcas pa/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshor bying ba las/ /'don par mdzad pa khyod 'ba' zhig /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /

slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol/ /

thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol/ /dam tshig slob mas gsol gdab pa'o/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin gyis/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ /khyod la yang dag bshad par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas gang 'das dang / /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang / /da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dag /de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes/ /gsang

sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /de ltar slob ma la gdams nas/ /bshags dang yi rang sogs bya zhing / /dang por gsum

la skyabs su gtang / /de nas byang chub sems bskyed bya/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud par bgyi/ /sems can

don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes sdom/ /'di nas brtsams te dang por gzung / /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya

dang / /de nyid yang dag gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin po che yi rigs sbyor ba'i/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re zhing ni dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba theg

pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni so sor gzung / /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas/ /sems can kun

gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung / /ma brgal ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing / /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /ces lan gsum gyis sdom pa gzung ngo / /de nas slob ma mdun bdar

ba/ /dri yis gtor nas snying ga ru/ /rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje gzung / /sna tshogs dag gis rnam 'byed pa'i/ /rdo rje spyi bor rnam par bsam/ /mgrin pa'i gnas su chu skyes nyid/ /de nas me tog spos sogs kyis/ /mchod pa byas nas mdun du gzhag /so shing sor mo bcu gnyis pa/ /dri yi

chu dang 'o mas bkru/ /rtse mo me tog gis bcings la/ /lan bdun bzlas pa'i dri chu yang / /kha dag bya phyir sbyin par bya/ /oM a dzi twa saM brta ni hU~M phaT/ so shing la bzlas pa'i sngags so/ /oM hrIHbi shud+d+ha d+har+m+mA sar+b+bA pA paM nish+tsa saM sho d+ha ya sar+b+ba bi kalpa a pa na ya hU~M/ chu sbyin pa'i sngags so/ /

slob ma byang du mngon bltas pas/ /so shing ma gas par bcas nas/ /ba lang pags pa'i tshad tsam gyis/ /sa yi phyogs su rab tu dor/ /steng 'phreng kha tshur bltas lhung na/ /shin tu skal pa bzang por 'gyur/ /phyi rim kha phar bltas pa ru/ /lhung na skal ba med par 'gyur/ /bsrung

ba'i don du srad bu la/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis bzla/ /de nas mdud pa gsum bya ste/ /slob ma'i dpung pa g.yas par bcing / /de nas phyir mi ldog bya'i phyir/ /slob ma rnams la spro ba bskyed/ /theg pa gzhan las ldog bya'i phyir/ /theg pa chen po'i che ba

brjod/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed/ /gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa/ /bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni/ /bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun/ /yongs su gzung ste skye bzhin pa/ /de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la/ /sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ /theg

pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyed rnams der ni dong bas na/ /rang byung skal pa chen po pa/ /'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur/ /yod dang med las rnam par 'das/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med/ /

zab mo rtog ge thams cad kyi/ /rab tu mi rtog gnas med pa/ /spros pa kun dang bral ba ste/ /spros pa rnams kyis rnam par spros/ /lan dang bya ba la sogs bral/ /bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi/ /theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di ni/ /tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur/ /bu kye nang

bar dkyil 'khor ni/ /'bri bar 'gyur ro nyol cig ces/ /smras nas rab zhugs yang dag mchod/ /dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol bar bya/ /'dod pa'i lha yis sbyor byin la/ /de nas gzhal yas khang nang na/ /slob ma bcug la yang dag bsrung / /seng ge'i nyal stangs

rab tu brtag /ku sha'i myu gu rtse ma nyams/ /d+hi las byung ba bsam par bya/ /dang po gcig ni sngas su gzhag /gzhan dag stan du gding bar bya/ /yid dge nyol la ji lta bar/ /rmi lam mthong ba ston cig ces/ /de ltar brjod la slob ma bsnyal/ /rmi lam ci mthong dri bar bya/ /

thos nas bzang ngam mi bzang ba/ /the tshom med par bshad par bya/ /dge bas dngos grub rnam gsum 'grub/ /mi dge sbyin sreg sogs zhi bya/ slob ma lhag par gnas pa'o/ /gza' dang skar ma bzang sogs la/ /nyi ma bzhi pa'i zhag la yang / /bla mas sbyin sreg byas nas

ni/ /slob mar bcas pas dkyil 'khor brtsam/ /zla ba drug dang gza' bzhi dang / /rgyu skar bcu bzhi gang yin dang / /tshes grangs bdun gyi grangs nyid la/ /rgyal bas rab gnas la sogs bsngags/ /dpyid 'bring tha dad dbyar tha'o/ /ston zla dgun gyi 'bring tha ma/ /gza' lhag

phur bu pa ba sangs/ /zla ba'i gza' dang 'di dag bzang / /tshes gnyis dang ni tshes gsum dang / /lnga dang bdun dang bcu pa dang / /bcu gsum pa dang zla gang ba/ /zhag bdun po ni bzang po yin/ /rgyal dang me bzhi lha mtshams dbo/ /snar ma byi bzhin mgo dang lag /snron snubs chu

stod chu smad dang / /khrums stod khrums smad skar ma rnams/ /skar ma dbo la rab gnas bya/ /des ni shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sems la gang ci gnas pa yi/ /dngos grub me bzhis 'grub par 'gyur/ /snubs dang byi bzhin dag gis ni/ /bka' rnams yongs su

shes par 'gyur/ /lag pa skal pa bzang por 'gyur/ /snar mas nor rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mgo la zhi bar brjod pa yin/ /chu stod chu smad bu 'phel 'gyur/ /khrums stod khrums smad 'phel bar shes/ /rgyal la thams cad du ni rgyal/ /snron la bde ba yang dag stsol//

lha mtshams mchog ni rab tu ster/ /dus dang gza' bzang la brten nas/ /bya ba 'di ni lhag gnas yin/ /thig skud sar pa gtsang ma ni/ /mdzes pa snal ma dgu 'am lnga/ /gcig tu bsgril ba lnga yi grangs/ /gsang sngags zlos shing bsgril bar bya/ /oM a n+yo n+ya A nu

ga ta sar+b+ba d+harmAHpa ra a nu pra ba Sh+Ti sar+b+ba d+harma a t+ya n+ta A nu pra ba Sh+Ti sar+b+ba d+harmAHzhes bya ba'i sngags so/ /'bar ba'i lta bas sangs rgyas kyi/ /thugs nas 'od kyi thig skud bkug /lag pa sbyar ba'i dbus gnas par/ /thig skud de ni rjes su bsgrub/ /oM a A a A AM

swA hA/ /thig skud sgrub pa'i sngags so/ /bla mas khu tshur g.yon pa ni/ /lte bar bzhag nas thig skud gzung / /de ma thag tu slob ma yis/ /sngags 'di yis ni gzung bar bya/ /oM dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod do/ /sngags kyis bum pa kun gyi chu/ /gtsang

mas khyim gyi nang du gtor/ /thig skud gdab pa'i rim pa bzhin/ /ye shes thig skud rab tu brkyang / /oM sar+b+ba saM sho d+ha ni hU~M phaT/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs par gtor ma'i sngags so/ /oM badzra sUtra sa ma ya ma ti kra ma hU~M/ /ye shes thig skud kyi sngags

so/ /mtshan ma med pas dngos mi 'grub/ /thig skud chad pas slob dpon 'chi/ /ring thung khyer na nad kyis 'debs/ /phyogs 'khrul pa yis myong par 'gyur/ /g.yas kyi phyogs su bskor ba yis/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i thig gdab pas/ /dkyil 'khor sprul

pa'i thig la yang / /ye shes thig skud rab tu gdab/ /hi hi sgrogs dang ldan pa yis/ /yid kyis sgo ni dbye bar bya/ /oM hU~M trAM aM khaM rnams kyis/ /rdul tshon lha yi rnam par sbyor/ /'bar ba'i lta bas bsgrub par bya/ /gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas/ /spos

dang na bza' la sogs pa/ /ji ltar 'byor pa dbul bar bya/ /rdo rje gsol zhing dril bu dgrol/ /rdo rje'i glu sogs kyis bskul te/ /dmar po'i gos gyon gtor ma sbyin/ /'di ltar yang ni lhag mos bya/ /'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /sems can khams ni

rnam grol byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /rnam snang mdzad rgyal bdag byas te/ /nyes pa kun las rnam grol ba'i/ /tshon rtsi dgye ba brtsam par bya/ /slob dpon gyis ni dang por dgye/ /phyi nas kun du slob mas so/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis/ /

blangs nas dbang ldan nas g.yas bskor/ /'khor lo can rigs rjes mthun pa'i/ /rim par sngags kyis rdul tshon bri/ /oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hU~M/ /gsang sngags so/ /phyi nas slob ma mkhas pa yis/ /ji ltar bde bar dgyes par bya/ /yon po ma dag chad

sbom po/ /phra mo mtshan ngan spang bar bya/ /sbom pos nad rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phra mos nor rnams 'jig par byed/ /yon pos rnam par 'gras par 'gyur/ /chad pas slob dpon slob ma 'chi/ /'di sogs skyon las nges grol ba/ /rdul tshon ri mos shes par

'gyur/ /in+d+ra nI la'i rang bzhin dang / /de bzhin gzhan yang margata 'dra/ /pad+ma rA ga'i rang bzhin dang / /ser po 'bar bas shes par bya/ /kha dog dkar po de bzhin gzhan/ /de ltar rdul tshon rim shes bya/ /shar du dkar po chen po ste/ /lho ru ser po 'bar ba yin/ /nub tu rab tu

dmar ba ste/ /byang du ljang gu de bzhin no/ /dbus kyi sa yi cha ru ni/ /kha dog sngon po rab tu brtag /slob dpon 'khor lo'i shar gnas pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ldan/ /hU~M mdzad la sogs sbyor ba'i bdag /slob dpon bzhi ni sgo bzhir yin/ /zur bzhir gzhag par bya ba ni/ /chos

sgrogs byed pa bzhi yin no/ /dam tshig nyams pas 'jigs pa'i phyir/ /slob ma min pa gzhug mi bya/ /med na gnyis sam gsum gzung bya/ /mtha' mar yang ni gcig 'dod bya/ /g.yas pa rdo rje gsor bya zhing / /g.yon pas dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /phyag rgya sgyur ba'i tsham ngam gtong / /

lta stangs phyag rgyas dgra las rgyal/ /sngags dang bcas pa'i stang stabs kyis/ /shar gyi gnas ni mnan par bya/ /rim pa 'di nyid kyis ni gzhan/ /sgo gnas dag gis kyang ni mnan/ /lag pa g.yas dang g.yon dag gis/ /rol dang bcas pas mtha' ru spro/ /cung zad bgrad pa'i sdang

mig dang / /bcas pas smin ma rnam par bskyod/ /'gro ba dbang du byed pa'i rgyu/ /mig gi phyag rgyar shes par bya/ /g.yas brkyang ba dang g.yon brkyang dang / /g.yas brkyang bskum dang g.yon brkyang bskum/ /hU~M zhes sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan/ /rdo rje 'chang ba'i rnal 'byor pa'o/ /gtso

bo'i slob dpon gzhan gyi'o/ /bus stabs tsog pu'i rkang stabs dang / /bskor ba'i stabs dang bzlog pa'i stabs/ /oM hU~M phaT/ shar sgo'i 'o/ /pus reg stabs dang g.yon 'degs stabs/ /bskor stabs seng ge'i mchod stabs so/ /oM hU~M AHphaT/ lho sgo'i 'o/ /g.yas brkyang ba

dang g.yon brkyang dang / /sa ga zlum po'i rkang stabs so/ /oM hU~M AM AM AM phaT/ nub sgo'i'o/ /mthun pa'i stabs dang mi mthun stabs/ /gcig bsdus g.yon brkyang rkang stabs so/ /oM ha na mA ra duSh+TA na/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya a a hU~M hrIHphaT/ byang sgo'i slob dpon gyi stong stabs dang sngags

so/ /'dod pa'i don grub bya ba dang / /bgegs kyi bar chad zhi bya'i phyir/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas lha la sogs/ /g.yas brkyang bkug la gtor ma sbyin/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /sa gdugs dang ni pad+ma sprel/ /ro tsa na dang dkar

po brkyang / /dkar po bkug nas 'dren pa ni/ /lha dang lha min grub pa dgug /oM AHbA ha ni ma hA bA ha ni pre ta bA ha ni sUR+Ya tsan+d+ra/ sid+ha mu khi dza ya rA dzI so ma rA dzI/ u ma de bi gang+ga ma/ su rU pI tA ra ya/ saM g+ha gra hA na sarbe/ ga Na pa ti/ kA ri ti ka ya shrI sa si de bi/ a ga lo ba ga la/ a su

rA su rA dza yo/ /puk+ka sI ma hA puk+ka sI/ hU~M ho ho A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ sa ma yA d+hi pe hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT dza swA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /oM ba ta li ba ta li ma hA ba ta li hU~M hU~M hU~M/ b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha dzardzu phruM phaT swA hA/ sngags 'dis spyan drang phyag rgya las/ /mdzub

bcings se gol gsum brdabs gtang / /mnyes par byed pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /dri yi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/ /me tog dkar po dgram par bya/ /shA li'i bza' ba rgya chen po/ /bu ram zho dang 'bras chan mar/ /mar me tshogs mchod rol stabs kyis/ /shar sgo ba yi gtor ma

sbyin/ oM e ka bI ke sma shA ne pa/ parba te kan+da re gr-i he grA ma pA ra she pa kre the tre shu n+ya ga re bi shi Shata/ b+h+wa dz+wa ne s+Tha la ga te/ mA ta d+ha na bi she Sha taHkr-iSh+Na ru dra de ba dat+te/ sa mA shrI ta kr-iSh+Na A ka rA la b+hi bA tsa nan+da tI ta bi nA ya ka/ /tsa muN+Da gau rI bi b+hats+tsha/ u ma de bI tsa ma tA ra/ dza yA na tsa/ bi dza yA Na tse ba/ a dzi

ta/ a pa rA dzi tA/ b+ha dra kA le ma hA kA li s+thU la kA li tu dzo gi nIn+d+ri/ tsan+d+ri gau rI/ duSh+Ta laM ba ki/ tri da shi shwa ri kaM bo tsi dA pI tsuM pi n+yA grA mA was+thi ta yo gi ni g+ho ra rU pi/ ma hA rU pi/ daM ShA rU pi/ ka pA li mA lA mA li n+ya kha Dang+gi na/ ma hA d+hi ka/ /khang+ga pa ra shu ha ta ya/ badzra hasta/ d+ha nu sta thA/ ma hA su kha

ma hA badzra sar+b+ba karma mA nu sA d+ha ka/ /yo ga maN+Dal ma hA rA dzA/ badzrA d+ha pa ti bra b+hu tha/ ta thA ga ta ma hA la la ni rany+dza yo gi d+h+r-iSh+Ti kA/ i daM ma hA su kha adz+nye nA/ a ba ha naM sar+b+ba sarbi Ni/ oM kak+ka D+ha na/ bab+ban+d+ha na/ khakh+khA ni/ sar+b+ba duSh+TA NAM hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT dzaHswA hA/ rdo rje'i stabs dang sngon phyag rgyar/ /

bcas pa'i sngags kyis spyan drang ste/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal bcings nas ni/ /mdzub gnyis lu gu rgyud byas la/ /oM dr-iSh+Ti hU~X hA b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha phaT swA hA/ /sngags dang phyag rgya 'dri mnyes bya/ /se gol gsum gyis 'dis mnyes bya/ /tsan+dan dmar po'i chu yis ni/ /phyi rol

dkyil 'khor gru gsum bya/ /der ni me tog dmar po dgram/ /nya skam sha skam sgog pa khrag /til phye bag phye 'bras sran chan/ /khyad par bdud rtsi lnga sogs dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs bza' ba rnams/ /lho sgo ba yi gtor ma yin/ /oM ma Ni b+ha dra/ pur+N+Na b+ha dra/ su b+ha dra/ dza ya b+ha dra/

nan+da kI la/ ma hA ki la/ su kI la/ pad+ma shi ka/ shaM kha shi ka na Ta/ ma hA na Ta/ b+he da nI/ ts+tshe da nI/ pu ra nI/ d+ha na d+ha su d+ha na/ su rU pa/ ke li ma hA ke li/ ha se ta/ kr-I Di ta bak+Shi pa/ su shrI ya rU pa kan+ti/ i daM badzre shwa rA ge nA wa naM/ yak+Sha yak+Sha ni/ hUM a ba ta ra a ba ta ra/ pa ta li ba ta

li/ pAk+Sha pr-i ye yo gI ni/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phruM swA hA/ khu tshur gnyis sbyar dam bcings te/ /snying ga'i gnas su mnan par bya/ /spyan drang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bcings bskor snying gar gzhag /sngags 'dis mnyes par byas la gtang / /oM da nA d+hi pa ti pa da

li phruM swA hA/ dkyil 'khor dmar po mngon byas te/ /me tog dmar dang ser pos mchod/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i zas/ /sna tshogs kyis bkang snod bzhag ste/ /zlum pa'i stabs kyis sngags bzlas te/ /nub sgor gnas pa'i gtor ma yin/ /oM a nan+ta/ ba su

ki/ tak+Sha ka /karko Ta/ pad+ma/ ma hA pad+ma/ shaM kha pA la/ ku li ka pA la/ de ba ti/ ma hA de ba ti/ so ma sha khI/ daN+Ta d+ha ra/ ma hA daN+Da d+ha ra/ a pA la la/ hu lu na dA nan+do pa nan+da/ sA ga ra/ ma hA sA ga ra/ tap+ta ma hA tap+ta/ shrI kAn+ti/ ma hA kAn+ti/ rat+ta kan+ti/ su rU pa/ ma hA su rU pa/

b+ha dra hi kaM/ ma ho rA ga/ /shi li/ ma hA shi li/ oM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ A gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ ma hA nA ga/ a d+hi pa ti sarba/ ra b+hu b+hu ba phruM phu swA hA/ zla ba'i khu tshur nyid byas te/ /sa gdugs dang ni rnam shes brkyang / /nyi ma'i lag pa brkyang byas te/ /sbrul mgo gdengs pa lta

bur bya/ /oM hi li hi li ma hA hi li phruM phruM phraM swA hA/ sngar gyi phyag rgya se gol bcas/ /sngags 'di yis ni gtor ma sbyin/ /tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor la/ /me tog dkar po dang ldan par/ /'o ma dang ni mngar gsum gyis/ /gang ba'i snod ni

gzhag par bya/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs kyis ni bya/ /byang sgo ba yi gtor ma yin/ /'byung 'jug la ni rdul tshon dang / /thig 'goms nyes pas 'jigs pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje shugs kyis tshon dang thig /yid kyis rdo rje gdeg par bya/ /oM badzra be gA kra ma hU~M/ nam

mkha' la rdul tshon dang thig gdegs pa'i sngags so/ /dri yi chu yi dkyil 'khor du/ /lha yi gnas ni so so bar/ /de gdan yang dag gnas pa la/ /de dag mtshan ma yang dag bri/ /gang dag 'khor lo yongs rdzogs pa/ /mtshon pas rdzogs par bya ched du/ /bde

gshegs ji ltar gsungs pa yis/ /spos rnams phyogs su nges par dbul/ /tsan+dan dang ni gur gum nyid/ /brag zhun de bzhin 'dod ma yin/ /rdzas 'di dag gi bdug spos che/ /mi bskyod pa la rab tu dbul/ /ka tso ra dang tso ri ka/ /gsum pa dzA ti ko sha ste/ /dngos

grub bskyed pa'i spos 'di dag /phan pa la ni sbyar bar bya/ /kun du ru dang po la ka /ri dgas lte ba sen mo ni/ /dngos grub rab tu sgrub pa yi/ /spos ni rin chen rgyal po yin/ /a ru ra dang bu ram dang / /sha thi'i dri dang sha thi nyid/ /sha li ka dang sih+la ka /'jig rten

mgon gyi bdug pa 'di/ /gsungs dang ma gsungs pa yi dri/ /dri yi bstan bcos las shes pa/ /spos 'di rta yi rgyal po ste/ /de dag mchod pa'i sgrub pa yin/ /de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil bzlas pa'i/ /dri chus dkyil 'khor gtor nas ni/ /bsrung ba byas te

phyir byung nas/ /bum pa la sogs sta gon bya/ /nag po rtsa ba sogs kun spangs/ /mgrin pa ring ba lto ba che/ /rdo rgyus dkar po btags pa yi/ /chus byugs yal gas kha brgyan pa/ /mgul du mdzes pa'i gos kyis dkri/ /rin chen 'bru sman snying por ldan/ /

rigs kyi mtshan mas mtshan pa ste/ /rgyal ba bzhi yi mtshan ma yis/ /stong pa'i logs bzhi ldan byas pa/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i bum par bya/ /gzhan yang de 'dra 'on kyang chung / /rigs kyi mtshan ma re re yin/ /bla re rgyal mtshan me tog sogs/ /mchod gtor rgya chen sta gon bya/ /de nas lus

gtsang dri zhim bgo/ /dkyil 'khor las rig yang dag bcas/ /do shal dpung rgyan rkang rgyan dang / /rna ba'i rgyan dang gdu bu dang / /sor gdub ska rags la sogs pa'i/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan byas pa/ /cod pan dmar po mdzes pa la/ /lan bdun bzlas

pas mgo bor bcings/ /dpal ldan rdo rje dril 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang mtshungs pas/ /bskor zhing bltas nas chad pa bskang / /lhag pa dbyi zhing sgo dbye bya/ /de nas bla re 'og gis/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol dris byugs pa'i/ /dbang ldan grwa yi steng gnas la/ /

bum pa lhag par gnas par bya/ /oM hU~M swA hA sngags 'di yis/ /cod pan kha rgyan gzhag par bya/ /hU~M bdun bzlas pa'i srad bu dkar/ /me tog phreng ba lhag par bcing / /tsan+dan dkar po'i dri chur bcug /phreng ba'i mgo bo lag bzung nas/ /rdo rje'i dbus bcings steng bzhag

la/ /sngags pas bdag po bsgom byas te/ /gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas/ /lhag par gnas nas mdun du bya/ /cig shos bum pa brgyad po rnams/ /g.yas su bskor zhing g.yon pa yis/ /de mtshan bdag po'i gsang sngags kyis/ brgya las brgyad ni lhag par

bzlas/ /de nas slob ma la sogs pa/ /bsang phyir 'khyil ba'i bum pa la/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i gzugs byas te/ /de yi gsang sngags 'ba' zhig la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas nas/ /shar gyi sgo dang nye bar gzhag /shar gyi gnas su gnas nas ni/ /lha yi rnal 'byor shin tu

ldan/ /dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i lha mchod phyir/ /'dir ni mchod pa'i bsgrub pa bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon bsam ji bzhin/ /'jig rten spyod pa'i rjes zhugs nas/ /mchod yon snod la sogs pa rnams/ /gnas ji lta bar gzhag par bya/ /dang por dag blo gsang sngags kyis/ /

mchod yon la sogs bsang gtor bya/ /oM sarba saM sho d+ha ni hUM phaT/ 'bras bu me tog la sogs pa/ /dngos po sna tshogs bsang ba'i sngags/ /oM AHswA hA/ dung phor snod na gnas pa yi/ /bdud rtsi lnga sbyang gsang sngags so/ /oM AHhU~M a swA hA/ dam tshig

gi chu bsang ba'i sngags so/ /oM shrI hU~M g+huM dzraM swA hA/ rnam shes 'jigs pa sbyar ba yis/ /lcags kyu lnga sbyang gsang sngags so/ /de nas rang gtso'i sbyor bdag nyid/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku/ /ye shes phyag rgya snyoms zhugs te/ /ting nge 'dzin la dmigs par

bya/ /ting nge 'dzin spos sangs rgyas rnams/ /rang rang mtshan mar dgod par bya/ /byin gyis brlab pa la sogs dang / /dbang bskur bar du yongs rdzogs bya/ /de nas gos zung dang bcas pa'i/ /snod rnams ji bzhin gnas pa las/ /gos dbul

ba yi sngags kyis ni/ /so sor lha la dbul bar bya/ /oM badzra wAs+t+ra sa swA hA/ /sngar bsangs byas pa gtsang ma yi/ /mchod yon la sogs mchod par bya/ /de nas bstod pa nges brjod de/ /bdud rtsi myang zhing dgyes par bya/ /me tog 'di ni bzang zhing dge /dag pa'i skye

gnas las dag pa/ /bdag gi dad pas dbul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /nags tshal las byung ro yi mchog/ /gang zhig dri yi bdug spos mchog /bdag ni dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /srin po

'joms shing dag byed pa/ /dge zhing mun pa rnam sel ba/ /bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /lhan cig skyes dang sbyar ba'i dri/ /shangs la tshim byed dag pa'i dri/ /bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas

bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /lha bshos gtsang ma thams cad ni/ /bza' dang bca' ba'i bye brag bcas/ /kha dog dri dang ror ldan pa/ /'bul gyis so sor bzhes su gsol/ /oM ku ru ku ru ma hA b+hak+Sha shrIM shrIM swA hA/ /lha bshos 'bul ba'i sngags so/ /oM dzaM swA hA/ 'bras

bu thams cad dbul ba'i sngags so/ /oM shrI hU~M g+huM dzraM swA hA/ /lcags kyu lnga dbul ba'i sngags so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgrub pa/ /mchod pa nyi shu bya ba ni/ /hU~M gi dam tshig las byung ba/ /rang gi phyag rgyas thams cad dbul/ /sgeg pa'i lag pas sgeg par bya/ /

phreng ba phreng ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'i/ /glu ni hU~M gi dam tshig gis/ /gar ni rdo rje rkang pas bya/ /de ltar pi wang gling bu sogs/ /mchod pa blo dang ldan pas bya'o/ /de bzhin me tog mar me dang / /spos sogs dngos mang tshogs rnams dang / /sna tshogs gos dang bla re dang / /dril bu

rnga yab mdzes pa dang / /bran po bran mo bzhon pa dang / /rta dang glang po la sogs dbul/ /bde gshegs gsungs pa'i dga' ston che/ /dkyil 'khor snying po'i nang phul bas/ /de nyid don las ma 'das shing / /don shes pa yi 'khor lo dgyes/ /rdo rje dril bu ma spangs

par/ /bstod bya bkra shis glu blang bya/ /hU~M hU~M hU~M/ de ba d+ha ru saM sa ra/ d+ha ru d+ha na d+ha li ga na/ dzau d+ha ru he badzra tu hU~M/ te na hU~M/ te na hU~M/ te na te te hU~M/ su ra na ra ban+ti ta tsa ra Na d+ha ru ku su ma bi ma na ma tha ro Sha ka ru he badzra tu hU~M/ te na hU~M/ te na hU~M/ te na te te hU~M/ b+ha ba bi mut+ti/ bi she sho gu h+ya ni

gu dzi/ a e ra ma ra ma he badzra tu hU~M/ g+hu h+ya na pi Ti a ga dzu tu hU~M/ rlung me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /oM gyis byin brlabs bdud rtsi lnga/ /rab spar rjes su ye shes kyi/ /bdud rtsir bsam zhing yig gsum bzla/ /nang bzhugs thub dbang dpag med pa/ /hU~M

byung rdo rje bcas pa'i lces/ /snying ga'i zla bar rgyal ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus tshim par bya/ /dran pa ma nyams rnal 'byor pas/ /thams cad byang chub rab bsgrub phyir/ /bshad dang ma bshad pa yi gar/ /rdo rje'i gom pas bya ba yi/ /mchod dang bstod pa nyer spyod

sogs/ /phul nas lha rnams mnyes par bya/ /sgrub pa grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du/ /bzhag nas phyir dbyung chos skyong la/ /'bras dang nya dang sha la sogs/ /chang dang bcas pa'i gtor mas mchod/ /slar yang nang zhugs rnal 'byor ldan/ /ma dag nyes pa zhi

bya'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor kun du bskor byas te/ /de ru mtshan mo rdzogs par bya/ /dkyil 'khor bdag pos snga dro ni/ /phyi rol slar yang byung nas ni/ /rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg byas pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rab tu mchod/ /rgyas par bya

ba'i don gyi phyir/ /'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho ga yis/ /yan lag la mkhas yan lag bcas/ /rgyas pa'i sreg rdzas bsreg par bya/ /dkyil 'khor sgo yi phyi rol du/ /slob ma gzhag nas de gzhug phyir/ /nang zhugs mchod pa cher byas nas/ /'khor bdag dbang

blangs bden pa brjod/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun du byung / /de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes/ /bden pa de yis dkyil 'khor du/ /gzugs brnyan gsal

bar slob ma ni/ /kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog /dkyil 'khor bdag po'i zhal byung ba'i/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bskul/ /lag gnyis rdo rje dril 'dzin pas/ /'khor lo can la glu yis bstod/ /nam mkha' skye ba'i mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha

ma med pa'i mchog /sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /mi bskyod rdo rje bdag 'grub mdzod/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod/ /nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa'ang khyod/ /

'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod/ /shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub

mdzod/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog /grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa/ /rdo rje snyems bdag bdag grub mdzod/ /sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa/ /sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs/ /sems can kun gyi yab gyur

nyid/ /'dod mchog dam tshig mchog gyur pa'o/ /bden pa gang gis ye shes mchog /shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor yin/ /bden pa de yis mgon bdag la/ /khyod kyis 'dod pa rab rdzogs mdzod/ /de ltar bstod cing phyag byas pas/ /'di ltar yang ni

gsol ba gdab/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo dkyil 'khor du/ /slob ma rab tu gzhug par bgyi/ /sems can don du bdag gsol 'debs/ /bzod pa mdzod de dgongs su gsol/ /de ltar de tshe gnang thob nas/ /slob ma der ni gzhug par bya/ /de nas dbang bskur skal

ldan pa'i/ /slob mas slob dpon zhabs dag la/ /btud nas me tog snyim bkang ste/ /'di skad ces ni brjod par bya/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa pos/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul brtan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal

lo/ /dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba/ /mi ldog 'khor lo'i 'byor bar ldan/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog /gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi/ /gsang ba'i rigs mthong thams

cad du/ /slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod/ /mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba/ /skal pa chen por bdag la stsol/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing / /dpe byad rnams ni yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la

stsol/ /dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung che/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ /de nas slob ma'i 'dod pa bzhin/ /'khor lo can la gsol ba gdab/ /rnam dag che ge mo zhes pa/ /byang chub sems ni yongs

'dzin cing / /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs nas/ /dam tshig dang ni sdom pa 'tshal/ /de nas slob dpon gnang thob pas/ /slob ma la ni dri bar bya/ /gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa/ gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam/ /des kyang

'tshal zhes brjod par bya/ /de nas bla ma rdor 'dzin gyis/ /slob ma sdom pa dang ldan pa/ /gos dmar gyon la ras dmar gyis/ /mig dag dgab par byas nas ni/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i bum pa'i chus/ /bsrung ba'i phyir ni bsang gtor bya/ /me tog kha

dog sna tshogs pa'i/ /phreng ba lag pas gzung ba la/ /sku gsum rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir/ /yi ge gsum po rnam par dgod/ /gsang sngags zlos shing lag bzung nas/ /slob ma gzhug par bya ba yin/ /oM kI li kI li ma li g+hur ni ta badzra tsa le yuM yuM yuM swA hA/ /slob ma

gzhug pa'i sngags so/ /sdug pa khyod ni su zhig ces/ /bla mas slob ma la ni dri/ /sdug pa skal chen bdag yin zhes/ /'di yis 'jug phyir smra bar bya/ /de nas nang du bcug nas ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad brgya byin la/ /sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs byas te/ /de nas dam

tshig bzung bar bya/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha pa dzo pas+tha nA ya/ A t+ma nAM na R+Yi tA ya mi/ oM A tsaR+Ya pU dzo bas+tha nA ya At+ma naM ni R+Ya tA ya mi/ oM sa ka le sa twa pa ri tra nA tha/ At+ma nAM ni R+Ya tA ya mi/ /de nas rdo rje dril 'chang ba'i/ /bla mas slob ma'i snying ga ru/ /rdo rje bkod de der gtad nas/ /dam tshig

mchog ni lan gsum brjod/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya a haM/ 'di ni dam tshig gzung ba'o/ /de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ /deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du grub

pa yang thob na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i rdo rje'i ye shes bskyed par bya/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du ma smra zhig /dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyis/ /snying la yang dag zhugs par

gyur/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /de nas sngon du sgrub pa yi/ /bdud rtsi lnga la bdun bzlas te/ /dung gis slob ma'i kha ru ni/ /sngags 'di brjod la sbyin par bya/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig

bsrungs na dngos grub pas/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'thungs shig /oM AHswA hA/ /bdud rtsi lnga'i chu blud pa'i sngags so/ /dam tshig gi ni chu 'thungs te/ /dad pa nye bar gnas pa la/ /ci ste 'di ni mi brtan par/ /dogs phyir bla mas brtan par bya/ /deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje

nga yin gyis/ /ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes brjod par bya'o/ /sems ni rab tu dga' bya'i phyir/ /gal te 'bebs par

byed na ni/ /snying gar rlung gi dkyil 'khor la/ /rlung gi sa bon rnam par bsgom/ /rkang pa'i mthil nas rlung gis gdeg /de yi snying gar bskul bar bya/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yi/ /nga rgyal ldan pas gsang sngags bzlas/ /sngags ni oM lo le la le hU~M AHsngags pas

brgyal bskyed nas ni/ /rdo rje dril bu dkrol byas te/ /de yi sngags kyi rdo rje'i glu/ /'jigs su rung bas gar bya'o/ /oM tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya pra ti ba liM ta hU~M hU~M hU~M ho ho ho swA hA/ ye shes phab pa las bskyod pa'i sngags so/ /de nas se gol brdab bya ste/ /me tog phreng ba bzang po

'dis/ /oM pra tIts+tsha badzra ho zhes brjod/ /dkyil 'khor snying por rab tu dor/ /gal te bzang por ma lhung na/ /lan gnyis bar du dor bar bya/ /de nas de yi mgor bcings te/ /phreng ba'i sbyor ba sbyin par bya/ /'di yis gdong g.yogs dbye ba ste/ /bla mas tshigs bcad

'di ltar brjod/ /oM rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyis/ /mig 'byin par ni brtson par mdzod/ /mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /oM dz+nyA na tsak+Shu hU~M a swA hA/ /'di ltar brjod rjes mig phye ste/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /de nas bla mas

slob ma la/ /'di ltar yang ni brjod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la da lta nyid/ /dad pa'i shugs kyis blta bar bya/ /khyod kyang sangs rgyas rigs las skyes/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /sngon ma byung ba mthong ba yi/ /slob ma 'dod dang ldan pa yis/ bla

ma'i zhabs la phyag byas te/ /de nas 'di ltar brjod par bya/ /oM rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bdag zhugs so/ /oM rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor bdag gis de ring mthong / /oM gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor

chen po yis/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur/ /de nas dam tshig kyang brjod par bya ste sa ma ya hoM hoM hoM/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bsten/ /rigs rgyal lha mo'i mtshan ma dang / /'dab ldan pad+mar bcas pa dang / /lha yi gnas rnams bstan par bya/ /'di dag

ni slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas slob mas slob dpon gyi/ /zhabs la gus par phyag 'tshal te/ /tshigs bcad 'di yis bla ma la/ /dbang bskur don du gsol ba gdab/ /khyod ni he ru ka dpal te/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis bde gsol

mdzad/ /byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyi/ /yang dag don mchog rnam dag pa/ /ji ltar de nyid bdud rtsi yis/ /dbang gi mchog ni bskur ba bzhin/ /de bzhin bdag la 'khor ba yi/ /sdug bsngal rnams ni bsal bar mdzod/ /rnal 'byor bdud rtsi dri med mchog/ /

ma rig nyes pa rab rib 'joms/ /gang gi byang chub bla med pa/ /de ring bdag gis thob par mdzod/ /dkyil 'khor shar du khru gnyis dor/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor phyed tsam gyi/ /dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid ldan pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis par slob ma gzhag/ /

mchod yon zhabs bsil la sogs sbyin/ /sbyang ba'i cho ga byas nas ni/ /slob ma shis par 'dod pa'i phyir/ /bla mas bkra shis glu blang bya/ /phun sum tshogs 'dzin gser gyi ri bo lta bu mdog /'jig rten gsum mgon dri ma gsum ni rab tu spangs/ /sangs

rgyas chu skyes 'dab rgyas lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba/ /bkra shis des ni ding 'dir khyod la bde byed shog /de yis nye bar bstan pa mchog rab mi g.yo ba/ /'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa/ /dam chos rab mchog skye dgu rnams la zhi bar byed/ /

'jig rten bkra shis gnyis pa deng 'dir khyod la shog /dam pa'i chos dang ldan zhing thos pa'i bkra shis phyug /dge 'dun lha dang lha ma yin dang mis mchod pa/ /ngo tsha dpal gnas tshogs kyi nang na rab kyi mchog /'jig rten bkra shis gsum pa deng 'dir khyod la shog /

dga' ldan lha yi gzhal med khang gi snying po nas/ /'gro la phan phyir bde gshegs dbang por bcas pa'i lha/ /rjes su 'brang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog /'dab sar 'tsher ba me tog char 'bab lum+bi'i

tshal/ /mang po lha yis bsten par mgon po bltams pa na/ /srid pa mthar gyur pa yi bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog /sna tshogs skyon rnams rnam par gzhom par bya ba'i phyir/ /dgyes pas dka' thub tshal du nam phyed

mngon par byung / /dbang bcas lha rnams rjes 'brangs gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog /chu bo'i 'gram du mchod yon phreng bas yongs su bskor/ /zhi phyir ngo mtshar gyur pa srid pa dag byed pa/ /klu yi rgyal pos legs

par bstod byed bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog /grong khyer mchog gyur ser skya zhes ni bya ba der/ /rmad du grags pa chen po'i lha yis mngon bstod pa/ /bsam yas dge bsgrubs de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis

des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog /sems can thams cad la ni phan phyir byang chub pa/ /dam chos rin chen tshogs ni thub pa las byung ba/ /sems can don bsgrubs rab rgyas brtson pa'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des kyang der 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog /rab tu 'od

'bar gser mdog lta bu'i sku mnga' ba/ /baiDUR+Ya mdog 'dra ba'i rtswa gdan steng du bzhugs/ /skyil krung legs bcas mi g.yo sku mnga'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog /shing gi rgyal po'i rtsa bar bcom ldan byams stobs kyis/ /bdud

phyogs kun las rnam par rgyal tshe sa dang mkhar/ /rnam pa sna tshogs ngo mtshar gyur pa'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog /bA rA Na sIr bzhugs nas bde bar gshegs ston pas/ /sa dang mkha' la shin tu ngo

mtshar gsal byung ba/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor ba'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog /bkra shis gang zhig phan byed dam pa mchod phyir thogs/ /bsod nams bya byed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon bstod pa/ /bcom ldan

thub pa shAkya seng ges kun gsungs pa'i/ /bkra shis des ni ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog /dril bu bskyod cing rdo rje gsor/ /bkra shis glu dang ldan pas so/ /gser la sogs pa'i stan gnas pa/ /der ni de la dbang bskur bya/ /de ltar de lta'i dbang la ni/ /lha

yi sbyor ba gang yin pa/ /de yi phyag rgyas mgul nas 'khyud/ /slob ma nges par byed du gzhug /dang po chu yi dbang gis dang / /gnyis pa cod pan dbang yin no/ /gsum pa rdo rje'i dbang yin no/ /bzhi pa rang bdag dbang yin no/ /lnga pa ming gi dbang bskur bya/ /

drug pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid/ /bdun pa bum pa'i dbang yin te/ /brgyad pa gsang ba'i dbang nyid do/ /dgu pa shes rab dbang gis te/ /de nyid rdo rje rab sbyor bas/ /brtul zhugs dang ni lung bstan nyid/ /'di dag ji bzhin rim pas sbyin/ /bum pa brgyad po thams cad

kyi/ /rang gi rig ma skyes bus chu/ /thugs rdo rje ru rab bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje 'chang bsams dbang bskur bya/ /rdo rje nyi ma rnam bsgoms pas/ /de la dbu rgyan sbyin par bya/ /thams cad snga ma bzhin bsgoms la/ /rdo rje'i tshigs bcad rab sbyor bas/ /rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pa/ /snying

gar rang gi lag pas gzung / /slob ma 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgom/ /rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur bya/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang gis ni/ /di ring khyod la dbang bskur bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /shin tu grub phyir rdo rje zung / /slob ma rta mchog bsgom byas la/ /lha

mo sgrol mas yang dag 'khyud/ /rdo rje bdag pos dbang bskur te/ /rdo rje dril bu dkrol du gzhug /oM badzra a d+hi pa ti twAM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma yas+t+wAM/ /slob ma rnam par snang mdzad bsgom/ /ming gi dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /oM badzra satwa s+t+wAM a b+hi Shany+tsa mi badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ kye

dpal che ge mo rdo rje zhes bya'o/ /dngos kun gang dang gang snang ba/ /gtso de rang gi lhag pa'i lha/ /chos rnams rang bzhin rnyog med pa/ /sangs rgyas ye shes blta bar bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung / /rdo rje snying

po'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra swa b+hA wa tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM d+ha rA ya mi hi hi hU~M/ bdag gis bde bar gshegs bcas ni/ /rim pa bzhin du bsdu bar bya/ /bde ba can na bcom ldan 'das/ /nyid kyis gang tshe chos bstan pa/ /de tshe gsang ba'i dbang pos zhus/

mi rnams ji ltar dbang bskur bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dgod pa dag la slob dpon te/ /blta ba gsang ba'i dbang de bzhin/ /lag pas reg pa shes rab nyid/ /de nyid gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa'o/ /dbang bskur ma 'ongs pa yin te/ /bla ma'i zhal las gsal

bar 'gyur/ /'di dag ni dbang bskur ba drug pa yin no/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni mdun gnas te/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i tshigs bcad 'dis/ /slob mas bla ma la gsol gdab/ /byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar chen po'i che gsal ba/ /bdag

kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol/ /de ltar slob mas gsol btab nas/ /bla mas skad cig ting 'dzin la/ /gnas nas de dbang bskur ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog spro bya/ /nye 'khor ba dan rgyal mtshan sogs/ /glu dang rnga sogs sa

ru ni/ /gdugs dang bla re bres nas su/ /'dug ste slob ma la 'di brjod/ /dbang bskur rin chen chen po ni/ /khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi/ /gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya/ /bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste/ /gnyis pa gsang

ba'i dbang yin no/ /gsum pa shes rab ye shes te/ /bzhi pa de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /thams cad thabs kyi cho ga yis/ /thams cad bla med mchod pas mchod/ /phyi nas lag nas lag tu ni/ /slob ma rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin/ /thog mtha' med pa'i

sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems ma bdag po'i bdag/ /a las byung ba'i shes rab gzugs/ /dril bu yang ni de la sbyin/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /rdo rje dril bu ming nyid do/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung / /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ /'di nyid kyi don ni/ rdo rje che dang dril bu che/ /zung shig rdo rje rab gnas pa/ /de ring rdo rje slob dpon gyur/ /slob ma bsdu ba nyid du gyis/ /mkha' 'gro lnga dang yang dag

ldan/ /dam tshig lnga yis yongs gang ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan dang ldan/ /slob ma rdo rje 'chang dbang bskur/ /dkyil 'khor pad+ma zhes su gsungs/ /yid kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa nyid/ /gzhal med khang zhes bshad pa ste/ /sems ni gzhal yas khang brtsegs nyid/ /

de la phyi rol gru bzhi pa'i/ /tshad ni mnyam par gyur pa'o/ /gang zhig byams pa la sogs sems/ /thig skud bzhir ni brjod pa'o/ /thig gang yang dag bshad pa yin/ /sbyor bas chos kyi rjes dran pa'o/ /lta ba kun las rnam grol ba/ /ye shes thig tu brjod pa yin/ /

rgyan gang yang dag bshad pa nyid/ /tshul khrims sogs kyi sdom pa mchog /dbang po gnyis la sogs pa'i sems/ /ra ba lngar ni byung ba nyid/ /gang zhig sgo zhes bshad pa ni/ /rnam par thar pa rnam pa bzhi/ /rta babs ka ba bzhi po ni/ /yang dag spong pa bzhi zhes brjod/ /

dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi/ /kha khyer bzhir ni brjod pa nyid/ /sgo gang bzhi ni gang yin pa/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnam pa bzhi/ /de bzhin me tog phreng brgyan pa/ /byang chub yan lag bdun po yin/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad po ni/ /ka ba brgyad po zhes brjod do/ /lam

gyi ye shes khyad par ni/ /rnga yab tu ni yongs su grags/ /gang dag do shal bshad pa ni/ /nyon mongs thams cad gcod pa ste/ /kun du bcad pa'i ngo bo yis/ /nyon mongs 'phrog pa dra ba nyid/ /tshogs gnyis dag gi sbyor ba las/ /'khor lo bskor ba gang yin pas/ /nyon

mongs phyed ni gcod pas na/ /do shal phyed pa nyid du brjod/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do/ /phung po lnga ni mdor bsdu na/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni rab tu grags/ /rdo rje skye mched nyid dag ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog /sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad/ /chu

yi khams ni mA ma kI/ /gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma dang / /me dang rlung du rab tu grags/ /gti mug gti mug longs spyod pas/ /gti mug zad pa gshin rje mthar/ /des ni phung po'i mthar byed de/ /des ni shes bya mthar byed pa'o/ /zhe sdang zad par mthar byed pas/ /nyes

pa zad pas shes rab mthar/ /des na sems kyi mthar byed de/ /des ni nyon mongs mthar byed 'gyur/ /'dod chags 'dod chags longs spyod pas/ /'dod chags zad pa pad mthar byed/ /des na ngag gi mthar byed 'gyur/ /de bzhin snyoms 'jug mthar byed do/ /nyon

mongs kun zad gang yin dang / /de bzhin las kun zad pa nyid/ /sgrib pa kun zad ye shes ni/ /bgegs ni mthar byed ces byar bshad/ /'di ni lha yi de kho na nyid do/ /phyir mi ldog pa slob dpon gyi dbang ngo / /mi bskyod sbyor ba btang byas te/ /rtag pa'i sbyor ba rjes dran

bya/ /slob ma drung du gzhag byas la/ /de yi rjes su bla ma yis/ /gos la sogs pas mig bkab nas/ /brtags pa'i stan la gzhag par bya/ /shes rab bcas par rab zhugs te/ /rdo rje sbyor ba yang dag brtsam/ /rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor bya/ /rdo rje sa bon

sbyor bas ni/ /slob ma brtag par bsam pa la/ /'dzag pa'i rigs zhes bya ba ni/ /ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /byang chub sras rnams dbang bskur ltar/ /bdag gis gsang ba'i dbang gis ni/ /sems kyi rgyun gyi dbang bskur ro/ /de chud za dogs mi za'i

phyir/ /nya phyis sogs kyis blang mi bya/ /dag pa'i lce yi mchog gis ni/ /gnyi ga las byung blang bar bya/ /'di ni de nyid bla na med/ /gnyis med yi ges brjod mi nus/ /chos dbyings rnam pa lta bu yi/ /dam pa'i bde ba yang dag myang / /bla ma rdo rje

'chang ba yis/ /g.yas pas mchod sbyin snying gar ni/ /khu tshur chos gos grwa nas gzung / /lag pas de yi dril bu gtad/ /dbugs 'byin thams cad byin nas ni/ /shAkya thub par rang gyur pas/ /slob ma chen po lung bstan te/ /sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur the tshom med/ /skye

rgas na dang 'chi mi 'gyur/ /'jigs dang mya ngan nad mi 'byung / /bde chen theg pa 'di la ni/ /bu khyod nga yis lung bstan bya/ /'di ltar nga yis lung bstan khyod/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro las

bsgral te/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha yi ming / /de bzhin gshegs par sa 'og dang / /mi yul mtho ris nyid du 'grub/ /'di ni gsang ba'i dbang dang lung bstan pa'o/ /snga ma 'am yang na gzhan yang rung / /rgyud du gsungs pa'i rim pa yis/ /phyag rgya bzang mo rab

brtags pas/ /'od dpag med sbyor ldan pa sbyin/ /lha mo thar byed dga' ster ma/ /sna tshogs gzugs can brtser ldan ma/ /zung shig zung shig sems dpa' che/ /gzung bar byas nas mchod par gyis/ /rdo rje bcings pa'i sbyor bas ni/ /rdo rje mchod pa yang dag

brtsam/ /rdo rje sems ni des phyung nas/ /rdo rje lce yis bza' bar bya/ /mnyam par byung ba'i cho ga yis/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bya ste/ /bsam gtan las byung sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas dbugs dbyung sbyin par bya/ /mchog tu gsang ba dag pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor

mthong dang rab zhugs pas/ /sdig pa kun las des grol bar/ /khyed rnams deng nyid legs par gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di la ni/ /slar yang 'chi bar 'gyur ma yin/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi 'chi bas/ /gang la'ang 'jigs med rol par gyur/ /srid pa

shin tu dag pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das/ /srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /ston pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin/ /dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /mchog tu brtag

pa'i bka' yin no/ /slob dpon smad par mi bya zhing / /bde gshegs bka' las 'da' mi bya/ /rdo rje spun la smad pa ru/ /nam yang smra bar mi bya'o/ /sems can rnams la byams dman min/ /skal med de nyid gtam mi bya/ /skal ldan sems can spang mi bya/ /bdag gi

lus la nges mi smad/ /dam pa'i chos la tshad mi gzung / /gzhan gyi chos la'ang brnyas mi bya/ /byang chub snying po'i mthar thug par/ /dkon mchog gsum ni spang mi bya/ /rtag tu dam tshig bsrung bar bya/ /rdo rje dril bu 'ang gzung bar bya/ /gtsug tor rtag tu gzung bar bya/ /

rtag tu sbyin sreg dgang bar bya/ /rtag tu dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya/ /rtag tu bde gshegs rab gnas bya/ /'byung po che la gtor ma sbyin/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbugs dbyung ba rgyas par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi ni dbang bskur nas/ /de rjes bzhi pa brjod par bya/ /rdo rje

dril bu de dbyangs kyi/ /gnyid kyis mig ni rgyas btab pa/ /rtogs shing rab tu rtog med pa/ /zhi ba gsal bar 'ongs pa yin/ /ye shes 'di ni ches phra zhing / /rdo rje snying po mkha' dang mtshungs/ /rdul bral thar ster zhi ba nyid/ /khyod rang yang ni de yi pha/ /bla ma dam pa'i zhal

las ni/ /bzhi pa shes par bya ba yin/ /slob ma'i bya ba rdzogs rjes su/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol byung nas ni/ /cho ga rdzogs phyir sbyin sreg bya/ /zhugs te rgyal rnams la bzod gsol/ /mchod dang bstod pa byas nas ni/ /g.yon pas dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /g.yas pas
